events.logic

Class LogicEventGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • events.EventGenerator<LogicEventListener>
      • events.logic.LogicEventGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventGenerator<LogicEventListener>, ILogicEventGenerator

    public class LogicEventGenerator
extends EventGenerator<LogicEventListener>
implements ILogicEventGenerator
    Generates all events that are send to the logic.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jasper S.
